```{r}
library(infer)
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(43)
n <- 32
x <- runif(32, min = 0, max = 1)
y <- (1/5)*exp(x)
x
y
mean(y)
(1/n)*sum(y <= 0.25)
quantile(y, prob = 0.95)

v <- tibble(y)

test <- rep_sample_n(v,size = n,replace = TRUE, reps = 10) |>
  summarize(mean(y),quantile(disp,0.95))
 

test
```
Instikt siger quantile giver noget forkert men skal lige kigge på definitionen
